The POST method is used to request that the origin server accept the entity enclosed in the request as a new subordinate of the resource identified by the Request-URI in the Request-Line If a resource has been created on the origin server, the response SHOULD be 201 (Created) and contain an entity which describes the status of the request and refers to the new resource, and a Location header.
The PUT method requests that the enclosed entity be stored under the supplied Request-URI. If the Request-URI refers to an already existing resource, the enclosed entity SHOULD be considered as a modified version of the one residing on the origin server. If the Request-URI does not point to an existing resource, and that URI is capable of being defined as a new resource by the requesting user agent, the origin server can create the resource with that URI.

def download(name, cache_dir=os.path.join('..', 'data')):
"""涓杞戒涓DATA_HUB涓浠讹杩版浠跺"""
assert name in DATA_HUB, f"{name} 涓瀛ㄤ {DATA_HUB}"
url, sha1_hash = DATA_HUB[name]
os.makedirs(cache_dir, exist_ok=True)
fname = os.path.join(cache_dir, url.split('/')[-1])
if os.path.exists(fname):
sha1 = hashlib.sha1()
with open(fname, 'rb') as f:
while True:
data = f.read(1048576)
if not data:
break
sha1.update(data)
if sha1.hexdigest() == sha1_hash:
return fname # 戒腑缂瀛
print(f'姝ｅㄤ{url}涓杞{fname}...')
r = requests.get(url, stream=True, verify=True)
with open(fname, 'wb') as f:
f.write(r.content)
return fname
def download_extract(name, folder=None):
"""涓杞藉苟瑙ｅzip/tar浠"""
fname = download(name)
base_dir = os.path.dirname(fname)
data_dir, ext = os.path.splitext(fname)
if ext == '.zip':
fp = zipfile.ZipFile(fname, 'r')
elif ext in ('.tar', '.gz'):
fp = tarfile.open(fname, 'r')
else:
assert False, 'zip/tar浠跺浠ヨ瑙ｅ缂'
fp.extractall(base_dir)
return os.path.join(base_dir, folder) if folder else data_dir
def download_all():
"""涓杞DATA_HUB涓浠"""
for name in DATA_HUB:
download(name)
# 涓杞借缁娴璇
download_all()

def log_rmse(net, features, labels):
# 涓轰ㄥ瀵规版惰涓姝ョǔ瀹璇ュ硷灏灏浜1艰剧疆涓1
# clamp规璇存璇瑙 璧5
clipped_preds = torch.clamp(net(features), 1, float('inf'))
rmse = torch.sqrt(loss(torch.log(clipped_preds),
torch.log(labels)))
return rmse.item()

def train(net, train_features, train_labels, test_features, test_labels,
num_epochs, learning_rate, weight_decay, batch_size):
train_ls, test_ls = [], []
train_iter = d2l.load_array((train_features, train_labels), batch_size)
# 杩浣跨ㄧAdam浼绠娉
optimizer = torch.optim.Adam(net.parameters(),
lr = learning_rate,
weight_decay = weight_decay)
for epoch in range(num_epochs):
for X, y in train_iter:
optimizer.zero_grad()
l = loss(net(X), y)
l.backward()
optimizer.step()
train_ls.append(log_rmse(net, train_features, train_labels))
if test_labels is not None:
test_ls.append(log_rmse(net, test_features, test_labels))
return train_ls, test_ls

璋K-浜ゅ楠璇灏辨train data涓K浠斤姣娆1/K浠戒涓洪璇锛澶1 - 1/K浠戒涓鸿缁浜瀹涓锛get_k_fold_data灏辨ㄥ杩浠朵
K-浜ゅ楠璇╀妯″╁瓒拌淬
def get_k_fold_data(k, i, X, y):
assert k > 1
fold_size = X.shape[0] // k
X_train, y_train = None, None
for j in range(k):
# slice规璇存璇瑙璧6
idx = slice(j * fold_size, (j + 1) * fold_size)
X_part, y_part = X[idx, :], y[idx]
if j == i:
X_valid, y_valid = X_part, y_part
elif X_train is None:
X_train, y_train = X_part, y_part
else:
X_train = torch.cat([X_train, X_part], 0) # 灏宸叉X_trainX_part杩ヨ捣
y_train = torch.cat([y_train, y_part], 0)
return X_train, y_train, X_valid, y_valid
k_fold涓姹姣涓寰扮trian-loss, valid-loss锛娉ㄦtrain_lsvalid_ls涓涓list锛瀛句姣娆¤凯浠ｅloss硷浠train_ls[-1]锛涔灏辨缁ｄ釜loss
K-寰扮train-loss骞冲valid-loss骞冲
def k_fold(k, X_train, y_train, num_epochs, learning_rate, weight_decay,
batch_size):
train_l_sum, valid_l_sum = 0, 0
for i in range(k):
# 杩data瀹涓涓缁(X_train, y_train, X_valid, y_valid)
data = get_k_fold_data(k, i, X_train, y_train)
net = get_net()
# data杩涓缁浼ワ瀵瑰train涓train_features, train_labels, test_features, test_labels涓
train_ls, valid_ls = train(net, *data, num_epochs, learning_rate,
weight_decay, batch_size)
train_l_sum += train_ls[-1]
valid_l_sum += valid_ls[-1]
if i == 0:
d2l.plot(list(range(1, num_epochs + 1)), [train_ls, valid_ls],
xlabel='epoch', ylabel='rmse', xlim=[1, num_epochs],
legend=['train', 'valid'], yscale='log')
print(f'{i + 1}锛璁缁log rmse{float(train_ls[-1]):f}, '
f'楠璇log rmse{float(valid_ls[-1]):f}')
return train_l_sum / k, valid_l_sum / k

import scrapy
class YybkListSpider(scrapy.Spider):
name = 'yybk_list'
allowed_domains = ['yunyubaike.com']
# 涓辨72涓URL锛杩娌℃
start_urls = ['https://www.yunyubaike.com/yunqi/',
'https://www.yunyubaike.com/yichuanyousheng/',
'https://www.yunyubaike.com/beiyun/']
def parse(self, response):
domain_url = "https://www.yunyubaike.com"
# items = []
this_url = response.url
page_nums = response.xpath("//div[@class='pagebar']/b/text()")
page_num = ''
if page_nums:
page_num = page_nums[0].get()
# page_num = response.xpath("//div[@class='pagebar']/b/text()")[0].get()
counts = response.xpath("//div[@class='pagebar']/a[@title]/b/text()")
count=''
if counts:
count = counts[0].get()
# count = response.xpath("//div[@class='pagebar']/a[@title]/b/text()")[0].get()
for li in response.xpath("//div[@class='list']/ul/li"):
titles = li.xpath('.//h2/a/text()')
title = ''
if titles:
title = titles[0].get()
detail_urls = li.xpath('.//h2/a/@href')
detail_url = ''
if detail_urls:
detail_url = detail_urls[0].get()
# detail_url = li.xpath('.//h2/a/@href')[0].get()
yield {
'this_url': this_url, # 褰URL
'page_num': page_num, # 绗椤
'count': count, # 璇ュ绫讳绛绘
'title': title, # 绛棰
'detail_url': domain_url + detail_url # 璇URL
}
# 涓涓椤
next_pages = response.xpath("//a[text()='涓涓椤']/@href")
if next_pages:
next_page = next_pages[0].get()
# next_page = response.xpath("//a[text()='涓涓椤']/@href")[0].get()
if next_page is not None:
yield response.follow(domain_url + next_page, self.parse) # 灏涓涓椤电杩ヤ缁缁х画瑙ｆ
pass

import os
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
input_dir = 'html/' # 涓涓姝ヤ瀛婧浠跺す璺寰
output_file_base_name = 'yybkSpider/output/yybk_{}.csv' # CSV浠剁淇瀛璺寰
MAX_ROWS = 50000 # 涓csv浠跺ョ澶ц
'''
瑙ｆ规锛浼ユ浠跺
杩瑕瀛娈
'''
def parse(file_name):
soup = BeautifulSoup(open(file_name, encoding='utf-8'))
# title瑙ｆ
title = ''
h1 = soup.find_all("h1")
if h1:
title = h1[0].get_text()
# content瑙ｆ
p_list = soup.select("div.article_content > p")
content = ''
for p in p_list:
p_text = p.get_text()
if p_text != '':
# 涓轰垮csv瑙ｆ澶辫触
p_text = p_text.replace(",", "锛").replace('"', '')
content += p_text + "\n"
content = content.rstrip().lstrip()
return title, content
pass
def main():
htmls = os.listdir(input_dir)
# 璁＄缁浠朵釜
file_num = (len(htmls) + MAX_ROWS - 1) // MAX_ROWS
for i in range(file_num):
# i浠0寮濮
# 绗i涓浠朵瀛 i*MAX_ROWS[涓] (i+1)*MAX_ROWS - 1
start_index = i*MAX_ROWS
end_index = (i+1)*MAX_ROWS - 1
if end_index > len(htmls):
end_index = len(htmls)
with open(output_file_base_name.format(i), "w") as f:
print("parsing :start_index:{}, end_index:{}; saving as {}"
.format(start_index, end_index, output_file_base_name.format(i)))
f.write("article_id,content,title\n")
for html_name in htmls[start_index: end_index]:
title, content = parse(os.path.join(input_dir, html_name))
f.write(html_name + ',"' + content + '",' + title + '\n')
pass
if __name__ == '__main__':
main()

private void exch(int i, int j){
Key tmp = pq[i];
pq[i] = pq[j];
pq[j] = tmp;
}

瀹swimsink
绱swim锛涓娴锛sink锛涓娌锛芥涓轰缁存ゅц川
浠瑕璁茬澶у锛姣涓归芥瀹涓や釜瀛瑰ぇ锛浣ㄦュ绱ゅ绱讹惧村ц川锛杩灏遍瑕杩杩涓や釜浣ユ㈠ц川浜

濡涓 A 姣瀹瀛癸涓涓涓锛灏锛ｄ A 灏变惰癸搴璇ヤ伙涓㈤ｄ釜村ぇ逛ュ惰癸杩灏辨瀵 A 杩琛涓娌
濡涓 A 姣瀹惰瑰ぇ锛ｄ A 涓搴璇ュ瀛癸搴璇ユ惰规涓ワ宸卞诲惰癸杩灏辨瀵 A 涓娴
swim浠ｇ瀹帮
private void swim(int k) {
//濡娴颁椤讹灏变瑕涓娴浜
while(k > 1 && less(parent(k), k)) {
//濡绗k涓绱姣涓灞澶э灏卞k涓
exch(parent(k), k);
k = parent(k);
}
}
sink浠ｇ瀹帮
//涓娌绗k涓绱锛浠ョ淮ゆ澶уц川
private void sink(int k) {
//濡娌板搴锛灏辨涓涓讳
while(left(k) <= N) {
//璁惧乏杈硅规杈澶
int older = left(k);
//濡宠竟瑰锛宸宠规涓涓澶у
if(right(k) <= N && less(older, right(k))) {
older = right(k);
}
//k姣宸冲╁藉ぇ锛灏变蹇涓娌浜
if(less(older, k)) break;
//锛涓绗澶ч《ц川锛涓娌k
exch(k, older);
k = older;
}
}
瀹delMaxinsert
delMaxinsert灏辨寤虹swimsink虹涓
insert规瑕ョ绱娣诲板搴锛跺璁╁朵娴版ｇ‘浣缃
public void insert(Key e) {
N++;
// 板绱版
pq[N] = e;
// 跺璁╁涓娴版ｇ‘浣缃
swim(N);
}
delMax规椤跺绱 A 搴绱 B 瀵硅锛跺 A锛璁 B 涓娌版ｇ‘浣缃
public Key delMax() {
// 澶у椤跺氨澶у绱
Key max = pq[1];
// 杩涓澶у绱㈠版锛や
exch(1, N);
pq[N] = null;
N--;
// 璁 pq[1] 涓娌版ｇ‘浣缃
sink(1);
return max;
}

import os
import argparse
import re
parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="count suffix from dir")
# 璁剧疆浼锛浼ラ瑕缁璁″缂浠跺す
parser.add_argument('-d', '--directory', required=True, type=str, help='need a full path')
args = parser.parse_args()
directory = args.directory
# 缁dict
res = {}
print("suffix : count")
# print(directory)
# 濡褰涓瀛ㄥ
if not os.path.exists(directory):
print("dir does not exist")
exit(1)
# 濡浼涓褰
if not os.path.isdir(directory):
print("need a dir not a file")
exit(1)
'''
os.walk寰扮涓缁琛锛轰褰锛褰涓褰琛锛褰涓浠跺琛
('.', ['dd', 'll.dir'], ['1.jpg'])
('./dd', ['e'], ['2.jpg'])
('./dd/e', [], ['3.jpg', '4.jpg', '5.txt'])
('./ll.dir', [], ['5.rar'])
'''
for path, dirs, files in os.walk(directory):
# print(str(files))
for file in files:
file = file.lower() # 界涓杞㈡灏
# 濡娌℃缂涓绾冲ョ璁¤
if not re.match(r'[\s\S]*\.[\s\S]*', file):
continue
# 寰板缂瀛绗涓
suffix = file.split(".")[-1]
# 浠瀛镐腑哄缂瀵瑰count锛濡娌℃榛璁や负0
count = res.setdefault(suffix, 0)
# count ++
count += 1
# 灏存扮count惧瀛
res[suffix] = count
# print
for key in res.keys():
print(key + " : " + str(res[key]))

public void put(int key, int value) {

class LRUCache {
private Entry head, tail;
private int capacity; // 瀹归
int size;
Map<Integer, Entry> cache;
public LRUCache(int capacity) {
this.capacity = capacity;
//濮浣
initLinkedList();
size = 0;
cache = new HashMap<>(capacity + 2); //杩涓轰涔瑕+2
}
private void initLinkedList() {
head = new Entry();
tail = new Entry();
head.next = tail;
tail.pre = head;
}
public int get(int key) {
Entry node = cache.get(key);
if(node == null) {
return -1;
}
move2Head(node);
return node.value;
}
/**
* 灏规ュ板ご癸濡瀹归宸叉弧锛浼ゅ熬
*/
public void put(int key, int value) {
Entry node = cache.get(key);
//濡keyㄧ瀛涓宸茬瀛锛绉诲ㄥ板ご
if(node != null) {
node.value = value;
move2Head(node);
return ;
}
//瀹归宸叉弧ゅ熬
if(size == capacity) {
Entry lastNode = tail.pre;
deleteNode(lastNode);
cache.remove(lastNode.key);
size --;
}
//add new Node
Entry newNode = new Entry();
newNode.key = key;
newNode.value = value;
addNode(newNode);
cache.put(key, newNode);
size ++;
}
private void addNode(Entry node) {
head.next.pre = node;
node.next = head.next;
node.pre = head;
head.next = node;
}
private void deleteNode(Entry node) {
node.pre.next = node.next;
node.next.pre = node.pre;
}
private void move2Head(Entry node) {
//ゅョ瑰崇郴
deleteNode(node);
addNode(node);
}
//瀹涔涓涓ㄧ被锛浣涓虹瀛捐〃
public static class Entry{
public Entry pre; //椹辩
public Entry next; //缁х
public int key; //缂瀛key
public int value; //缂瀛value
public Entry(int key, int value) {
this.key = key;
this.value = value;
}
public Entry() {
}
}
}

from typing import List
from traitlets import Int
class Solution:
def maxPlatform(self, arr: List[Int], dep: List[Int]) -> Int:
n = len(arr)
max_platform = 0
for i in range(n):
now_platform = 1
for j in range(i+1, n):
if dep[i] > arr[j]:
now_platform += 1
max_platform = max(max_platform, now_platform)
return max_platform

class Solution {
public int maxPlatform(int[] arr, int[] dep) {
int n = arr.length;
Arrays.sort(arr);
Arrays.sort(dep); //瀵瑰拌揪绂诲搴
int numPlatform = 0, maxPlatform = 0;
int i = 0, j = 0; //涓や釜
while(i < n || j < n) {
if(i < n && j < n) {
if(arr[i] < dep[j]) {
numPlatform++;
i++;
} else if(arr[i] > dep[j]){
numPlatform--;
j++;
} else {
i++;
j++;
}
} else if(j>=n) { // 姝ゆ惰灏缁х画杞杩绔
numPlatform++;
i++;
} else { // 姝ゆ跺杞虹
numPlatform--;
j++;
}
maxPlatform = Math.max(maxPlatform, numPlatform);
// System.out.println(numPlatform);
}
return maxPlatform;
}
}

//AnnotationTest.java
import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
import java.lang.annotation.Target;
import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
import java.lang.annotation.Inherited;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;
/**
* Annotationㄥ灏芥颁腑浣跨ㄧず渚
*/
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@interface MyAnnotation {
/*
* 璇存锛ㄨ锛浠涓芥value()涓涓规锛涓涓
* ㄤ娇ㄧ跺浠ラ杩@MyAnnotation(value={"a","b"}ヨ
* default 缁value跺浜榛璁ゅ
* 濡娉ㄨВ灞у涓涓锛涓value锛ｄ浣跨ㄨユ敞瑙ｆ讹浠ヤㄦ瀹灞у锛涓洪璁ゅ氨缁value璧硷
* @MyAnnotation({"a","b"}) //杩蜂浠ョ
*
String[] value() default "unknown";
}
/**
* Person绫汇瀹浼浣跨MyAnnotation娉ㄨВ
*/
class Person {
/**
* empty()规惰 "@Deprecated" "@MyAnnotation(value={"a","b"})"娉
* (01) @Deprecated锛崇empty()规锛涓琚寤鸿浣跨
* (02) @MyAnnotation, 崇empty() 规瀵瑰MyAnnotationvalue兼榛璁ゅ"unknown"
*/
@MyAnnotation
@Deprecated
public void empty(){
System.out.println("\nempty");
}
/**
* sombody() 琚 @MyAnnotation(value={"girl","boy"}) 娉锛
* @MyAnnotation(value={"girl","boy"}), 崇MyAnnotationvalue兼{"girl","boy"}
*/
@MyAnnotation(value={"girl","boy"})
public void somebody(String name, int age){
System.out.println("\nsomebody: "+name+", "+age);
}
}
public class AnnotationTest {
public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
// 板缓Person
Person person = new Person();
// 峰PersonClass瀹渚
Class<Person> c = Person.class;
// 峰 somebody() 规Method瀹渚
Method mSomebody = c.getMethod("somebody", new Class[]{String.class, int.class});
// ц璇ユ规
mSomebody.invoke(person, new Object[]{"lily", 18});
iteratorAnnotations(mSomebody);
// 峰 somebody() 规Method瀹渚
Method mEmpty = c.getMethod("empty", new Class[]{});
// ц璇ユ规
mEmpty.invoke(person, new Object[]{});
iteratorAnnotations(mEmpty);
}
public static void iteratorAnnotations(Method method) {
// ゆ somebody() 规MyAnnotation娉ㄨВ
if(method.isAnnotationPresent(MyAnnotation.class)){
// 峰璇ユ规MyAnnotation娉ㄨВ瀹渚
MyAnnotation myAnnotation = method.getAnnotation(MyAnnotation.class);
// 峰 myAnnotation硷骞舵板烘
String[] values = myAnnotation.value();
for (String str:values)
System.out.printf(str+", ");
System.out.println();
}
// 峰规涓娉ㄨВ锛骞舵板烘
Annotation[] annotations = method.getAnnotations();
for(Annotation annotation : annotations){
System.out.println(annotation);
}
}
}

int[] advantageCount(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {
int n = nums1.length;
// 缁 nums2 搴搴
PriorityQueue<int[]> maxpq = new PriorityQueue<>(
(int[] pair1, int[] pair2) -> {
return pair2[1] - pair1[1];
}
);
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
maxpq.offer(new int[]{i, nums2[i]});
}
// 缁 nums1 搴搴
Arrays.sort(nums1);
// nums1[left] 灏硷nums1[right] 澶у
int left = 0, right = n - 1;
int[] res = new int[n];
while (!maxpq.isEmpty()) {
int[] pair = maxpq.poll();
// maxval nums2 涓澶у硷i 瀵瑰绱㈠
int i = pair[0], maxval = pair[1];
if (maxval < nums1[right]) {
// 濡 nums1[right] 借杩 maxval锛ｅ氨宸变
res[i] = nums1[right];
right--;
} else {
// ㄦ灏煎绘nums2澶у
res[i] = nums1[left];
left++;
}
}
return res;
}

import java.util.PriorityQueue;
import java.util.Queue;
public class MyPriorityQueue {
public static void main(String[] args) {
Queue<User> queue = new PriorityQueue<>(
(User user1, User user2) -> {
return user2.getLevel() - user1.getLevel();
}
);
queue.offer(new User("sb_1", 1)); //浼绾т
queue.offer(new User("vip_1", 2)); //浼绾ч
while(!queue.isEmpty()) {
User user = queue.poll();
System.out.println(user.getName());
} //洪椤哄vip_1, sb_1
}
}
class User{
private String name;
private int level;
public User(String name, int level) {
this.name = name;
this.level = level;
}
//gettersetter
}

public class Singleton {
private volatile static Singleton instance;
private Singleton() {}
public Singleton getInstance(){
if(instance == null) {
synchronized (Singleton.class) {
if(instance == null) {
instance = new Singleton();
}
}
}
return instance;
}
}
